title: Workflow
description: Gevamu solution supports the following business flows:

children.value: Gevamu solution supports the following business flows:
BNO onboarding: registration of the Gevamu Payments Gateway with the PSP.
Participant onboarding: registration of a Participant in the BNO network and with Gevamu Payments Gateway.
Payment initiation: a process initiated by the Participant and handled by Gevamu solution.

props.alt: Workflows supported by the Gevamu solution
